name: MYT Connect
description: The MYT Connect app is the digital link to the world of Mytheresa, the leading e-commerce company in the luxury goods industry.  As a user, applicant or employee you will find relevant and compelling information about Mytheresa, such as the latest company updates and figures, and get a glimpse of life behind the scenes.  Want to join the Mytheresa family? As an interested person or applicant, you will find up-to-date information on vacancies, get to know the company and corporate culture and learn about our individual departments. In the Job of the Week section you will find the most exciting job advertisements - and can share them directly with your network via your social media channels. As an employee, you have exclusive access to additional functions and information.  Curious? Download MYT Connect now and explore the app, or contact us directly via Contact.
